title: Design Drone Hardware for Agricultural Surveillance
description: Design the hardware components of autonomous drones suitable for agricultural surveillance.

title: Develop Autonomous Navigation System
description: Develop a system for autonomous navigation of the drones.

title: Create Computer Vision Algorithms for Crop Monitoring
description: Develop computer vision algorithms for the drones to monitor crops effectively.

title: Develop Resource Optimization Algorithm

title: Write Technical Documentation for the Project
description: Write technical documentation for the droneAgricoleIntelligent project, including hardware design, software implementation, and usage instructions.
